definition: a plot to carry out some harmful or illegal act (especially a political plot), to engage in plotting or enter into a conspiracy, swear together
details:
noun
- a plot to carry out some harmful or illegal act (especially a political plot)
= synonyms: conspiracy
- a clique (often secret) that seeks power usually through intrigue
= synonyms: faction, junto, camarilla
verb
- to engage in plotting or enter into a conspiracy, swear together
= synonyms: conspire, complot, conjure, machinate
